keyword: how many calories are in a 4 loko
title: How Many Calories Are in a Four Loko?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a 4 loko, including carbs, sugars, and other nutrition facts for a standard 23.5 oz can, plus variations by flavor.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Four Loko?
assumptions: Standard 23.5 fl oz (695 ml) can, typical fruit flavor at 12% ABV, no added mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, size, and alcohol content. Alcoholic beverages' values can differ; consume responsibly and check labels.

quick_answer.text: A standard Four Loko can has about 660 calories, primarily from sugars and alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to a lower-sugar flavor (e.g., sour variety)
Opt for a 16 oz slim can instead of 23.5 oz

faqs.q: How many calories are in a 4 loko can?
faqs.a: Approximately 660 calories for a standard 23.5 oz can.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Four Loko?
faqs.a: About 102 g of carbs, mostly sugars (98 g), per can.

faqs.q: Does Four Loko have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; calories come from carbs and alcohol.

faqs.q: How do calories vary by Four Loko flavor?
faqs.a: Fruit punches are higher (~660 kcal); lighter sours may be ~460 kcal.

faqs.q: Is Four Loko low in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 50 mg per can, but alcohol content affects overall health impact.
